timeline.bodyText:
watch out! succeeded is a Boolean so it can be null (when the throwable != null).
That is why I use the pattern of checking whether the throwable is null first in these callbacks to avoid bugs.
You could also use something like
https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang/javadocs/api-2.4/org/apache/commons/lang/BooleanUtils.html#isTrue(java.lang.Boolean)
or
if (succeeded != null && succeeded)
